item.title: The best WHDload games
item.description: The best WHDload games IMHO The A500 mini has finally arrived. I think enough ink has been spilled on the unit itself (as well as whatever you spill when you make YouTube videos) but suffice to say I have one, it’s beautiful and easy to use, and it has some cool games on it. My favourites are :
item.content:
The best WHDload games IMHO

The A500 mini has finally arrived. I think enough ink has been spilled on the unit itself (as well as whatever you spill when you make YouTube videos) but suffice to say I have one, it’s beautiful and easy to use, and it has some cool games on it. My favourites are :
